sms_marketing_page.powerful_mkt_tool_desc: Have you ever known that SMS marketing has existed for over 20 years? Despite being a senior of most marketing tools, SMS marketing is now widely used than ever and gaining popularity day by day. It allows businesses to deliver customers a great experience and build a good relationship with them by updating them.

sms_otp_page.improves_the_security: Improves the security in your business with SMS OTP authentication
sms_otp_page.description: SMS OTP, also known as SMS One-Time-Password, is a 6-digit code for two-factor authentication. It is an extra layer of protection used to ensure the security of financial transactions and online accounts. In the SMS OTP authentication method, OTP is sent via SMS text to the user’s phone. The user receives the OTP and enters it on the device where the authentication is happening. The OTP must be used within a specific time frame, reducing the risk of fraud in online transactions.

terms.acceptance:
1. Acceptance of Terms

By accessing and using our website, you agree to be bound by these terms and conditions. If you do not agree with any part of these terms, you should not use our website.
terms.user_conduct:
2. User Conduct

You agree that you will not:

- Violate any applicable laws or regulations

- Disrupt the functioning of the website or related services

- Collect or gather personal information or data without proper authorization

- Post or transmit unlawful or harmful material
terms.disclaimer:
3. Disclaimer of Liability

This website is provided on an 'as is' and 'as available' basis without any warranties or guarantees of any kind. We do not guarantee the accuracy, completeness, or reliability of the content and materials on this website.
terms.limitation:
4. Limitation of Liability

In no event shall sms2buy be liable to you for any direct, indirect, consequential, incidental, or other damages arising from the use of our website or the content on the website.
terms.governing_law:
5. Governing Law

These terms and conditions shall be governed by and interpreted in accordance with the laws of Thailand. Any disputes arising from the use of this website shall be subject to the jurisdiction of the courts in Thailand.

privacy_policy.data_collection:
1. Data Collection

We may collect personal information from users, such as names, email addresses, and contact information. This data will be used solely to provide and improve our services and will not be disclosed to third parties without proper authorization, unless required by law.
privacy_policy.cookies:
2. Cookies

Our website may use cookies to enhance the user experience. These cookies may track your browsing behavior on our website and help us improve our services. You can adjust your browser settings to reject cookies or receive notifications when cookies are being used.
privacy_policy.data_security:
3. Data Security

We implement appropriate security measures to protect against unauthorized access, alteration, disclosure, or destruction of personal data. However, please note that no method of transmission over the internet or electronic storage is completely secure, and we cannot guarantee the absolute security of data transmitted through our website.
privacy_policy.change:
4. Changes to Privacy Policy

We may update or revise this privacy policy from time to time as necessary. It is your responsibility to periodically review the privacy policy for important information regarding how we collect, use, and protect your data.

If you have any questions or concerns about these terms and conditions or the privacy policy, please contact us at sale@sms2buy.com.

Please note that these terms and conditions and privacy policy may be subject to change to ensure compliance with current laws and relevant legal requirements governing the use of our website.

By accessing and using our website, and by engaging in any actions or giving consent on our website, you are deemed to have agreed to be bound by these terms and conditions and privacy policy.
